signal_description: From the table named 'defaultview-545', get the sum of all values in the 'PO Item Total Amount' column.
llm_output:
Here is the summary of the given SIGNAL query in a human-readable format:

{
  "signal_description": "From the table named 'defaultview-545', get the sum of all values in the 'PO Item Total Amount' column."
}

To generate this summary, I first looked at the main query keywords:

- SELECT indicates that values will be retrieved from the table
- SUM() specifies that an aggregate function will be applied to calculate the sum 
- The column name inside SUM() shows which column will be summed
- FROM indicates the table name that will be queried

I then summarized this in plain language, mentioning the table name 'defaultview-545', the column name 'PO Item Total Amount', and that the values from this column will be summed.
